get.description:
Resource that defines the receiver for Push Notifications
Retrieves the current push receiver information.

post.description: Updates the current push receiver information

receivers.description: Array of query strings formatted as per OCF rules, e.g. rt=oic.r.temperature&rt=oic.r.humidity

rts.description: The list of allowable resource types for this instance of a push receiver
